mapper.select: select stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.stime, memb.mno, memb.name, memb.tel from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cfno = cafe.cfno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime order by stamp.stno desc limit #{firstPost}, #{postNo}

select stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.stime, memb.mno, memb.name, memb.tel from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cfno = cafe.cfno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime and memb.name like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') order by stamp.stno desc limit #{firstPost}, #{postNo}

select stamp.stno, stamp.many, stamp.stime, memb.mno, memb.name, memb.tel from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cfno = cafe.cfno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime and memb.tel like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') order by stamp.stno desc limit #{firstPost}, #{postNo}

select count(*) from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cfno = cafe.cfno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime

select count(*) from stamp left outer join mcard on stamp.mcno = mcard.mcno left outer join memb on mcard.mno = memb.mno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on scinfo.cfno = cafe.cfno where cafe.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} and stamp.stime>=STR_TO_DATE(#{searchFirstDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{searchLastDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')>=stamp.stime and CASE WHEN #{searchCondition}="memb.name" THEN memb.name WHEN #{searchCondition}="memb.tel" THEN memb.tel else '' END like concat('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

select memb.name, memb.tel, (select count(mcuse) from mcard where mcuse=1)'usable-card', (select mcard.birth from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join stamp on stamp.mcno=mcard.mcno where stamp.stime in (select stamp.stime from stamp order by desc limit 1) and memb.mno=#{customMemberNo} and cmemb.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo}) 'made-date', (select stamp.many from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join stamp on stamp.mcno=mcard.mcno left outer join scinfo on mcard.scno = scinfo.scno left outer join cafe on cafe.cfno = scinfo.cfno left outer join cmemb on cafe.cmno = cmemb.cmno where memb.mno=#{customMemberNo} and cmemb.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} ) 'all-stamp', (select stime from memb left outer join mcard on memb.mno=mcard.mno left outer join stamp on stamp.mcno=mcard.mcno where stamp.stime in (select stamp.stime from stamp order by desc limit 1) and memb.mno=#{customMemberNo} and cmemb.cmno=#{cafeMemberNo} )
